introtext: If you have an Android-phone, you're on the perfect website! You can find here some APK-files for apps I made by myself, which you can install on your phone. You'll download a .zip-file with the app-file and an information-file with info about installing the app.
selectapp: Select the download-page of an app:
datetext: Expected date of first real app:
text01: This is the downloadpage of Widget. Widget is an app where you can type text inside the app and see this text at the widget on your homescreen.
text02: You'll download the app to use it on your phone. You can always send me feedback at my GitHub-profile! Click the button below to download the app.
